subject: Olympic Games
lead_paragraph: The sprinter Tyson Gay withdrew from the London Grand Prix on Wednesday, insisting the hamstring he injured at the United States Olympic trials would not keep him out of the Games. Gay, who had been having treatment in Germany, was scheduled to race against the Jamaican Asafa Powell in the 100 meters on Friday.
